content.raw: I'm going to wait until @philipstarkey is around and show him the vertical vs horizontal layout in the lab to see what he thinks, I was starting to get used to the vertical layout, I think that it visually grouped the widgets for each DDS channel under the channel name more clearly. @rpanderson, you might want to have a look too?
